subject: Region missing during checkout
description_text:
Hello,
I have a question regarding the checkout process. While attempting to
complete my purchase, I was unable to find Poland in the list of available
countries. Could you please clarify whether this is a technical issue on
the website, or if shipping to Poland is unavailable?
Best regards,
Kacper Langa

conversations.body_text: Hi Kacper Langa,     This is our Polish agent's website where you can make purchases.  https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
